title: WATCH: Doctors Have to Tell People That Potato Juice Does Not Cure Strep Throat. Yes, People Really Thought It Did.
description:
This story reminds me of the great Tide Pods fiasco of 2018 when doctors had to literally warn young Americans not to eat laundry detergent. Now, doctors are explaining to TikTokers that potato juice actually can't cure strep throat. Contrary to popular (?) belief.

The bizarre claim seems to have originated from Allie Casazza, a blogger and author with some 12k followers on TikTok. Casazza claimed to have cured her daughter's severe case of strep throat by giving her the juice of a potato.

\u201cIf you've seen someone mention Strep Throat & potato "juice" today, this is why.\n\nNeedless to say, but eating a raw potato does not cure Strep, if you actually have Strep your doctor will tell you by taking a sample & immediately prescribing antibiotics\nNot through self diagnosis\u201d
— ChudsOfTikTok (@ChudsOfTikTok) 1677618857

Casazza began the video by explaining that strep is one of the only diseases she hasn't been able to cure naturally and had to use antibiotics. Until she discovered root vegetables. Apparently.

She then explained that she juiced a regular ol' spud and had her daughter drink it. According to Casazza, her daughter's strep, which was so bad she could barely swallow, was gone within two hours.

I've tried to find any sort of scientific basis for this claim. I'm sure you're shocked to hear I have come up empty-handed. Potatoes do apparently reduce inflammation, which is cool. But no, they don't cure strep. And the doctors of TikTok were quick to make this very clear before potato juice becomes the next health fad.

Dr. Rubin responded to a claim that potato juice is a natural anti-fungal and anti-biotic. The comment also spelled potato "potatoe," which is irrelevant to the story, but did make me chuckle.

Rubin debunked the research behind the comment and explained that, while potato juice could potentially help treat a sore throat, it does not kill the strep bacteria.


@rubin_allergy

Replying to @waitingtogo nice try, but solanimycin found in potatoes may help fight Candida albicans, which is a fungus, not a bacteria. There’s no substantial evidence potatoes treats strep throat. Antibiotics treat strep throat.


Another doctor said the video was "one of the most dangerous videos" he's ever been sent and simply said, "do not treat your child with potato juice".

@dr_idz

Natural cure for STREP THROAT!! #weightloss #fatloss #nutrition #fitness

The original video from Casazza has since been deleted. Hopefully because the mother ended up getting some antibiotics. Fingers crossed.

title: Elon Musk Tweeted About The Lab Leak Theory And Now Chinese Commies Are Threatening Him
description:
This past week, yet another conspiracy theory was confirmed as the Department of Energy concluded that the COVID-19 pandemic likely originated from a lab in Wuhan, China. Weird, I feel like I remember someone saying that about three years ago...

\u201cApril 2020\n\n"Have you seen anything that gives you a high degree of confidence that the Wuhan Institute of Virology was the origin of this virus?"\n\nTrump: "Yes I have. And I think the WHO should be ashamed of themselves because they're like the public relations agency for China"\u201d
— Dan O'Donnell (@Dan O'Donnell) 1677435593

Anywho...despite how frustrating it is, the conclusion from the Department of Energy is not at all surprising. And the Chinese Communist Party is not at all happy about that. In fact, the CCP actually warned Elon Musk not to share information about the totally-not-real fake news claim that the virus originated from the Wuhan Lab. Y'know, to stop the mIsInFoRmAtIoN.

The trouble began when Musk replied to a tweet that read, "Dr. Anthony Fauci funded gain-of-function research at the Wuhan lab, lied to Congress about it, and now both the FBI & the Department of Energy have concluded that the coronavirus originated at the Wuhan lab. Does that mean Dr. Anthony Fauci funded the development of COVID-19?”

Musk's reply says, "He did it via a pass-through organization (EcoHealth).”

\u201c@KanekoaTheGreat He did it via a pass-through organization (EcoHealth)\u201d
— kanekoa.substack.com (@kanekoa.substack.com) 1677436709

This prompted a warning from Global Times, a news organization that essentially serves as the mouthpiece of the CCP. The network wrote on social media, "Elon Musk, are you breaking the pot of China?”

Apparently, "Breaking the pot after eating” means “biting the hand that feeds you.”

\u201c#China Communist Party paper warns @elonmusk against pushing #COVID19 lab leak theory. @globaltimesnews posts on social media \u201cElon Musk, are you breaking the pot of China?\u201d (\u201cBreaking the pot after eating\u201d is Chinese \u201cbiting the hand that feeds you.\u201d) https://t.co/iWmMZAOiGt\u201d
— Eunice Yoon (@Eunice Yoon) 1677563235

It went on to say, "Some may think @elonmusk made those remarks only to attack Fauci. [But the posts he reposted] almost all link the origins of #Covid19 to China and the argument is repeatedly used by the US right wing and anti-China media hostile to China to frame #China.”

It's no secret that Tesla has significant operations in China, so that could be the "hand that feeds" Musk. As for China trying to convince the entire world that it has done nothing wrong ever throughout the whole pandemic...that's a tougher sell. Y'know, given their record of doing most everything wrong. Allowing a virus to spread throughout the entire world and supporting total lockdowns for months tends to stick with people. That's just how it goes.

title: WATCH: Greta Thunberg Is Once Again Yeeted By Police, But This Time It Was Over Norwegian Reindeer Pastures
description:
The world's strongest climate change warrior, Greta Thunberg, has yet again been detained by police for her heroism. It's unclear yet whether this incident was also staged, but the circumstances look pretty similar. Although this time there's no Antifa. Always a plus.

Our climate heroine was in Norway protesting the placement of 151 wind turbines on reindeer pastures owned by Sami herders. I, for one, did not know until this moment that reindeer pastures existed. But they sound pretty fantastic, so I understand Greta's frustration.

In 2021, Norway’s supreme court ruled that two wind farms violated Sami rights under international conventions. Despite this ruling, the turbines are still operating.

It is quite hilarious that Greta and co. are now even protesting "green" forms of energy, like these wind turbines. They're upset because "a transition to green energy should not come at the expense of Indigenous rights." They just can't ever be happy, can they?

Greta was carried away by police, as the protests blocked access to several government buildings. She told Reuters before her removal, "We want to make it very clear that it is the Norwegian state that is committing the real crime here, for violating human rights." And reindeer rights. Can't forget those.

\u201cPolice \u201carrest\u201d Greta Thunberg during protest against wind farm in Norway\n\n\u201d
— The Post Millennial (@The Post Millennial) 1677685130
\u201cGreta Thunberg and dozens of other activists have blocked entrances to Norway\u2019s energy ministry, demanding removal of wind turbines built on land traditionally used by Indigenous Sami reindeer herders https://t.co/1T2XKXxu92\u201d
— Reuters (@Reuters) 1677611100

Afterward, Greta returned and blocked the entrance to the climate and environment ministry along with other protestors, until she was removed again.

To be completely honest, I think I might be with Greta on this one. Those wind turbines are downright hideous. Who wouldn't want reindeer pastures instead of fields of giant metal bird murderers?

\u201cIndigenous Sami reindeer herders negotiate agreement allowing them to block BKW's wind power project in the Fosen peninsula of western Norway that will impact their winter pasture.\n\n#CorporateResponsibility\n\nhttps://t.co/aZcj69Wo7Z\u201d
— CorpWatch (@CorpWatch) 1630580703

I mean, look at it. It's like Santa's workshop. And according to the herders, the sight and sound of giant wind turbines frighten their reindeer, and "disrupt age-old traditions".

So, this might actually be one point for Greta. But mostly for the reindeer.

title: Watch: It's AEW meets WNBA at a high school basketball game where even the cheerleaders get tossed around
description:
If there were more professional wrestling-esque brawls at women's basketball events, the WNBA wouldn't be as unpopular as it is. Just sayin', it's worked wonders for hockey. WNBA arenas could probably get up to close to 50% capacity if people were expecting fisticuffs like at this at an Oklahoma High School game. When Jim Ross says it "looks like Muskogee Oklahoma on a Saturday night," I imagine it resembles the clip you are about to watch.

No one is even sure what caused it to pop off. Words were said. Fists were thrown. Parents got into it with players. And the deity or deities of content blessed us with this glorious nineteen-second video.

@OSSAAOnline Tulsa Central vs Star Spencer girls pic.twitter.com/Sv5J7eBQcL
— Kyle Brooks (@kyleb0418) February 24, 2023

You know it's all hell broke loose when even the cheerleaders are ready to cut a b*tch.

Though the hero is #1. #1 got CHUCKED by someone's dad. Which, f*ck you for tossing a girl like that, buddy!

#1 wasn't even phased. She got right up off the ground, ran right back to the pile, and was looking to connect with anyone her fists made contact with. I believe that's what the kids call a "ride or die."

Local news caught up with the woman who remembered to do it for the content and recorded the melee. "It really wasn’t like a dirty game. I mean, everybody seemed normal. So, it definitely caught me off guard… There were a few players involved, but most of the players were standing back. So, yeah, it was definitely, I would say more of the fans and parents."

The boys' game took place immediately following as planned, and without incident. The fellas are more dignified.

Editor’s Note

LwC is on Substack now! Each day we overwhelm your brains with the content you've come to love from the Louder with Crowder Dot Com website.. but algorithms hide our ranting and raving as best they can. The best way to stick it to Big Tech? Subscribe to For the Content!

title: Florida man gets arrested with so much child pornography, it weighs over a literal ton
description:
Think about your most favorite thing in the world. Something you love to collect. Comic, baseball cards, shot glasses, what have you. Now imagine having over 200,000 of that thing. Because Paul Zittel had 200,000 images of child pornography.

He's in jail now. That's the good news. The bad news is... 200,000 images of kiddie porn? All boxed up it weighed over thousand pounds. A literal ton of kiddie porn.

Ocala man arrested after detectives find more than 200,000 printed images of child porn youtu.be

The ironic thing is he looks like someone who would have a literal ton of kiddie porn.

According to reports, the Marion County Sheriff’s Office got a tip that files of child porn were uploaded online. They tracked the IP address to the 72-year-old Zittel. That's where this story gets... different. While anyone obtaining kiddie porn is a scumbag who is worthy of scorn, they tend to not produce hard evidence.

Zittel was PRINTING OUT THE DIGITAL IMAGES. Like your boomer dad who still prints out maps. Only gross. He would then keep those images in boxes that he kept at this home. Though he was at least smart enough not to let people in his room without being escorted. A disgusting cretin? Sure. Just not a total moron.

Zittel was arrested. He's charged with 25 counts of possession of child pornography. How he only got 25 counts when he was caught with TWO HUNDRED THOUSAND IMAGES is unclear from the story. One count is too many. 25 counts are enough to lock you away for good, I suppose.

Editor’s Note

LwC is on Substack now! Each day we overwhelm your brains with the content you've come to love from the Louder with Crowder Dot Com website.. but algorithms hide our ranting and raving as best they can. The best way to stick it to Big Tech? Subscribe to For the Content!

title: WATCH: This British Gentleman Says It's Ok To Burn A Bible, But Clams Up When Asked About The Quran
description:
It is always quite entertaining to see people hold two entirely contradictory beliefs and be completely unaware of this fact. It's like wokeism has overtaken their ability to apply simple logic.

Take this British dude, for example. He was asked by a reporter for Reasoned, a UK-based free speech campaign, if religious tolerance or freedom of expression is more important. He unsurprisingly answered freedom of expression and explained that "the mark of a free society is what you're able to say" and emphasized the importance of the right to offend someone. Which I largely agree with.

But just wait.

\u201c"The right to offend somebody is important because we live in a free society," this man says, agreeing that an individual should have the right to burn a Bible.\n\nHowever, how does he respond when it comes to the Quran?\u201d
— Reasoned (@Reasoned) 1677530739

The reporter then asked him if she should have the right to burn a Bible. He said yes, explaining, "I mean, I wouldn't personally, I'm not a religious but I wouldn't think that's a great thing to do. But I think that still it's a right you have in terms of expressing your political views, your kind of, I guess, anti-religious views in that case, in a free society."

Fair enough. But here's where it got interesting. The reporter asked him about a recent story where four students at a Yorkshire secondary school were suspended for desecrating a Quran. The book reportedly remained intact, and the Head Teacher said there was no "malicious intent". The teacher was told the book had been taken to school as a dare by a student who lost a Call of Duty game with other students.

The reporter asked if he thought this was the right move on the school's part. He responded, "I do because I don't think it's particularly - I don't think that's damaging that person's free speech."

Wait, what? What about all that "free society" gobbledygook?

He went on, "I think there's a confusion between free speech being viewed as someone literally being suppressed from being able to speak out and someone being you know, punished for that action."

Oh, so as long as we can say something, our free speech isn't being suppressed. Even when they send us to the gulag. Unless of course, it's the Bible. Then anything goes.

He then went on the say the school had a right to punish the student for being "culturally insensitive" and even "racist".

To be fair, I can see how free speech rules would be different in a school than in society at large. I would be interested to hear whether he thinks a student should be punished at school for desecrating a Bible. I think we know his answer, but maybe we can give him the benefit of the doubt. Maybe.

title: Watch: NYC mayor, a DEMOCRAT, wants to put prayer back in public schools to replace all the guns
description:
Eric Adams had an odd flex Tuesday morning for the middle ground. It involves prayer, guns, and schools.

The right feels students should have the option to pray in school, and also feel there should at the very least be armed guards. The right is of the belief we should protect our children the same way we protect our elites. The left believes f*ck your thoughts and prayers, and f*ck your guns even harder.

Adams looked to split the difference at an interfaith breakfast. "When we took prayers out of schools, guns came into schools."

“When we took prayers out of schools, guns came into schools.”

— NYC Mayor Eric Adams (D) speaking at the New York Public Library interfaith breakfast pic.twitter.com/2GkxKCB5bX
— The Recount (@therecount) February 28, 2023

But wait, that's not all! "Don’t tell me about no separation of church and state. State is the body. Church is the heart. You take the heart out of the body, it dies. I can’t separate my belief because I’m an elected official.”

Don't get it twisted. I'm not saying Adams is going to be touring the state with Rev. Jason McGuire from the New Yorker’s Family Research Foundation. Adams doesn't get a cookie for saying a single thing that makes sense.

This is the same mayor who said he'll send cops door to door to see if you are good enough for a gun permit. His devotion to religion is even in question with his recent pro-abortion, anti-freedom comments.

I've also been following New York politics long enough to know NYC leftists are about to have a collective aneurism. Social media influencer Rep. AOC is preparing her Instagram live stream as we speak.

But Mayor Adams is not wrong in pinpointing the timeframe of when schools started to grow more violent. It's odd to hear it coming from a Democrat.

Editor’s Note

LwC is on Substack now! Each day we overwhelm your brains with the content you've come to love from the Louder with Crowder Dot Com website.. but algorithms hide our ranting and raving as best they can. The best way to stick it to Big Tech? Subscribe to For the Content!

title: WATCH: Ryan Long Trolls Unsuspecting Bystander About Transgender Infants And It's Absolutely Magnificent
description:
Ryan Long recently took to the streets to miserably confuse poor bystanders in an absolutely hilarious fashion. Long asked this gentleman if he should be able to transition his infant nephew since everyone's pretty sure he's actually a girl. Due to all the crying.

\u201cShould babies transition?\u201d
— The Boyscast (@The Boyscast) 1677615051

Long asked at what age it would be appropriate to start a gender transition, noting his nephew is a week and a half old. The flabbergasted dude replied, "you should wait and ask him". Long kept pushing and explained his reasoning is that the infant keeps crying all the time for no reason, while another nephew they have is "pretty chill" and "for the boys." So they're fairly certain that one's correctly gendered.

The interviewee, clearly deeply concerned, concluded, "I wouldn't know that, but I definitely think you'd wanna check with a doctor". Which is great advice. But then he, unfortunately, went on to say Long should raise the child in an "a-gendered fashion". Sigh.

This guy was obviously very confused and did his best given the circumstances. But unfortunately, if Long were serious and actually did take the child to the doctor, the doctor may tell him to start transitioning his newborn nephew. Y'know, given that Boston Children's Hospital claimed babies know whether or not they're transgender in the womb.

\u201cBoston children\u2019s hospital AKA Boston child abuse distribution, now says children know they\u2019re transgender in the womb. How can can a fetus know it\u2019s gender???\n\ud83e\udd21\ud83d\ude43\ud83e\udd21 \u201d
— \ud83c\uddfa\ud83c\uddf8Stand4Logic\ud83c\uddfa\ud83c\uddf8 (@\ud83c\uddfa\ud83c\uddf8Stand4Logic\ud83c\uddfa\ud83c\uddf8) 1665258600

I'm sure you're shocked to hear the hospital has since deleted this video. Oh, and the hospital is also affiliated with Harvard. So that's wonderful.

All in all, Long's style may be the best way to fight these cultural battles and shift the narrative back to reality. This is one of the best ways to highlight how insane actual arguments from the left are, as opposed to just shouting at one another and getting nowhere. Plus, it's hilarious. Which is fun for us.

title: Anti-woke nonprofit releases ad slamming progressive's "equity" obsession that blows GOP media consultant ads away
description:
It's one thing to claim you're anti-woke because your consultants market-tested the buzzword. It's another thing to go as hard in the paint as this new digital ad from Citizens for Sanity does.

It's a simple message, really. If you don't care about race and gender, you are normal. If you are obsessed with it like the people who run Joe Biden and the rest of the Democrat Party are, you are not. Also, you are -ist and -phobic as f*ck.

The wait is over! Citizens for Sanity is out with a brand new ad exposing the RACIST equity mandates destroying our society. Equity = Bigotry. Pass it on. pic.twitter.com/dZ4nd2upet
— Citizens for Sanity (@citizens_sanity) February 27, 2023

What sells it are the questions. "Is my pilot a transgender refugee?" "Is my medical team is incredibly diverse?" "Did my crime-invested city's police department hit its equity goals for the year?"

A normal person answers no to all of them. Even an abnormal leftist will answer "no" to themselves in private as they publically signal their virtue about making sure they have one of each gender operating on them. But those are the same leftists who go right to the -isms and -phobias whenever a woman, gay, or black person dares have a single opinion that disagrees with progressive orthodoxy.

To normal people, it isn't normal to think your skin color or whatever gender you are this week should determine who gets a job. Not when you look at equity in action with Biden Adminstration, who can't even take the time to find competent diversity hires.

Democrats Aren't Normal. There's your message to run on for the next two years.

Editor’s Note

LwC is on Substack now! Each day we overwhelm your brains with the content you've come to love from the Louder with Crowder Dot Com website.. but algorithms hide our ranting and raving as best they can. The best way to stick it to Big Tech? Subscribe to For the Content!

title: WATCH: This Tiktoker Faced Major Backlash For Calling Out Jeffrey Marsh But She Hit Back With The Receipts
description:
Our pal Jeffrey Marsh has taken some heat for telling their young followers to subscribe to their Patreon so they can have deep, private conversations without their parent's knowledge. Just a slight red flag.

One of Marsh's critics is a woman named Shumirun Nessa on TikTok. Nessa replied to a video of Marsh where he aggressively stated, "stop telling trans people that we're inspirational." Nessa responded, "Stop telling kids to go on your Patreon and chat to you privately without their parents knowing."

This of course sparked widespread outrage from the trans community. Nessa said she has been called transphobic and attacked for being Muslim. But they also claimed Marsh was not actually talking to kids. So Nessa brought the receipts.

She played a montage of Marsh saying, "Hey kids," and "I want to talk to the kids". Which seems fairly straightforward to me.

@therealoverloadcomedy

I HOPE THIS CLEARS SOME THINGS! Also I made this video NOT because they are trans, I would have created the same video for anyone who is trying to harm kids! PERIOD!


She asked why Marsh wants to talk to kids whose parents have "screwed up" privately, on Patreon, about things that can't be discussed in the comments section of TikTok.

"Why? Why do you want to do that? Why can't you chat about these topics in these comments? Is it because it might get flagged or something? What could be the reason?"

She then went to Marsh's Patreon and highlighted some of the topics they're discussing with patrons. One of them was "going no contact," presumably with one's parents/family. Another was simply called "more on sex". A tad fishy, no?

Nessa went even further by explaining some of the signs of grooming, such as "gaining access and isolating the victim" and "trust and keeping secrets". Like perhaps directing children to a private platform to talk about inappropriate topics that their parents just "don't understand".

In the caption of her video, Nessa explained that she did not make the video because Marsh is trans, but because they are engaging in inappropriate behavior with children. Which should go without saying, but these days, everything needs a LGBTQ disclaimer. On the bright side, the comments on her video were overwhelmingly positive and supportive, so hopefully this type of behavior will come to an end.

title: 'Family Guy' actor apologizes for ever apologizing for playing a cripple in the cartoon
description:
Don't get me wrong. I dig the trend of actors not apologizing for art leftist bloggers and Twitter slacktivists demand they apologize for. Shout out to Ben Stiller. It was just surprising to hear we were coming after Joe the Policeman ("holy crip, he's a crapple") on Family Guy now. Yet we have voice actor Patrick Warburton apologizing. For apologizing.

'WE NEED HUMOR': Patrick Warburton won't apologize for iconic 'Family Guy' role. https://t.co/MeqcVcJhyS pic.twitter.com/SjIGAAHjow
— Fox News (@FoxNews) February 27, 2023

Warburton sat down with Fox News, and while acknowledging that what flew then might not fly now, said he is done apologizing. "I used to apologize for being on 'Family Guy,' and I apologize no more because this world is a horrible native satire. Everybody takes themselves too seriously, and… I think in many ways become an overwhelming mess. But we need humor in our lives, and we need love and humor, acceptance. It's all rather simple."

Warburton, to his credit, double-downed on his comments with his most cancelable action yet. He RETWEETED something from Fox News. Yes, even in this news climate.

I believe I said horrible need of satire, but I think it translates 😉 a comedic form that’s been around since the beginning of time. An equal opportunity offender that holds the mirror to us all, maybe.. https://t.co/xE6X4tbfjl
— patrick warburton (@paddywarbucks) February 27, 2023

I find this funny for two reasons. For one, Family Guy is up there with South Park where they managed to be grandfathered in when it comes to culture of canceling. You rarely hear the cartoon in the mix with the usual three: Blazing Saddles, Tropic Thunder, and The Office. Somewhere in Springfield, Apu is getting ready to move his family to Quohog to reopen the Kwik-E-Mart.

The other is that for everything you'd assume the usual gang of bloggers and slacktivists would attack the cartoon over, a jacked-up cop in a wheelchair doesn't register. The cartoon, at least in the past (I don't even know if it's on anymore), defecates on everything leftists care about this week when it comes to race and genderism. Outside of a non-profit somewhere upset Joe isn't voiced by a paraplegic voice actor, he wheels away with nary an angry tweet.

An actor not in a wheelchair is done apologizing for playing a cartoon cop in a wheelchair. It isn't something he should need to apologize for, but at least he's done doing so.

Editor’s Note

title: Chicago Mayor Lori Lightfoot loses reelection so we wish her well in her future endeavors with these career lowlights
description:
Lori Lightfoot shattered a glass ceiling on Tuesday. She became the first gay black woman to lose reelection as the Mayor of Chicago. In a run-off election, Lightfoot will be succeeded by one of two cisgender men: Paul Vallas and Brandon Johnson. Johnson at least has equity.

I've seen enough: Paul Vallas and Brandon Johnson advance to the April 4 runoff in the Chicago mayoral race, defeating Mayor Lori Lightfoot.
— Dave Wasserman (@Redistrict) March 1, 2023


Lori Lightfoot was crushed in tonight’s Chicago mayoral race and didn’t even make the runoff. 84% of Chicagoans voted against her. 84%! That level of incompetence is tough to pull off for an incumbent. Congrats to her.
— Clay Travis (@ClayTravis) March 1, 2023

Shout out to the voters of Chicago. We give progressive cities sh*t for reelecting the same failed progressive officials to enact the same failed progressive policies, then wonder why their city has turned into a crime-invested suckhole. Chicago voters decided a city where you can rob an ATM machine in broad daylights with a backhoe, where there is a homeless encampment INSIDE O'Haire, or where a reporter can become a victim of crime while reporting on crime live are all bad things.

Though when reached for comment on why she thinks she lost, the woman critics called "Beetlejuice" has this to say:

I'm a black woman in America. Of course.

As Lightfoot transitions to the next stage in her life -- either with the Biden administration or with a show on MSNBC -- let's not forget her career highlights.

Like how the Mayor of Chicago's plan to fight crime was to victim-blame small businesses for allowing themselves to become victims of crime. Or when she suggested if people don't want to get mugged they shouldn't carry cash.

Her approach to crime did wonders in driving the Chicago economy. Both major corporations and small businesses were driven out of the city.

Lightfoot's had a special way with words too. Like when she lashed out at the Supreme Court and told white reporters they couldn't sit with her. Or our favorite, that she has a bigger d*ck than the Italians.

On behalf of everyone here at the Louder with Crowder Dot Com website, we wish Lori Lightfoot well in her future endeavors.
